name: fastbrowse-extension
description: Lightweight Chrome extension to reduce memory usage through smart tab management

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.dev: echo "Load extension in Chrome from chrome://extensions/"
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build:firefox && npx web-ext run --source-dir dist-firefox
scripts.zip:firefox: npm run build:firefox && (cd dist-firefox && zip -r ../fastbrowse-firefox.zip . -x node_modules/\* .git/\* *.zip)
